name: Matterport
tagline: AI-powered 3D virtual tours and digital twins for real estate
description: Matterport creates immersive 3D virtual tours and digital twins of properties using AI. Agents can capture spaces with a smartphone or 3D camera, and Matterport's AI automatically generates dollhouse views, floor plans, measurements, and interactive walkthroughs. Used by top brokerages worldwide to showcase listings remotely and reduce unnecessary in-person showings.
